welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lunenburg, a charming coastal town known for its rich maritime history and stunning architecture! Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty and charm this city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boire Field Airport is for private and charter flights only.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport, serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport serves flights to and from other countries and offers customs and immigration services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester-boston Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
